It's a company that is a perspective or existing customer, can also be affiliate or a partner. Account should belong to one GBU/IBU only. It is associated with UPSA Customer as one-to-one.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CRM is the primary system for account management. Any updates on customer records are propagated to Read investor relations sections, their annual reports (if available), obtain additional research via EPAM's Presales Team, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Industry Challenges, Pain Points\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Understand key industry challenging affecting your customers, major pain points they're trying to address in the marketing place, any regulatory requirements they're trying to meet, etc. Understand which EPAM's competencies might help the customer solve their problems.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Heat map of Relationships\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AM should get a clear picture of the customer's organization structure. Keep track of who is supportive of EPAM and what contacts should yet be established.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Example:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9c345c81-c455-4286-9d13-e0250b20137f/image2016-2-5%2014-17-24.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":707,\"height\":410}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Communication Plan and EPAM's Executive Alignment\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Plan forward the communication with customers, define and invite the participants from both sides and develop the agenda.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The communication plan should be created up front and meetings should be scheduled: recommended are the weekly/bi-weekly meetings with the operations/line management of the customer, monthly meetings/status reviews with the heads of groups or departments of the customer and quarterly, semi-annual or annual reviews with C and VP level. It's always good to specify the attendants in the communication plan and secure EPAM executive presence for the yearly review.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Wallet Share Analysis\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Understand what customer wallet share of budget is available for EPAM to attain.
